mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(id, title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(boards_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, u.username FROM boards b INNER JOIN users u ON b.usersid = u.id ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS fetch NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT totalCount, ceil(totalCount/10) totalPage, currentPage, decode(currentPage, ceil(totalCount/10)-1, 1, 0) isLast, decode(currentPage, 0, 1, 0) isFirst FROM (select count(*) totalCount, #{page} currentPage from boards)
